author: jaz
msg: added rounding to currency display, this does not change the default behavior, but rather gives the option to set the rounding number (rounding=2) in the transform. Useful when you don't control the code which returns the number.

author: dims
msg: Fix for AXIS2-926 - Wish to set package name for system xsb files when using xmlbeans.
In your wsdl2java command line please add the following option.
